description: Gets current and future weather information

essential_properties.name: cityName
essential_properties.description: The name of the city to return the weather of

essential_properties.name: cityId
essential_properties.description: The ID of city to return the weather of. List can be downloaded here: http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/.

essential_properties.name: latitude
essential_properties.description: The latitude of the location to return the weather of

essential_properties.name: longitude
essential_properties.description: The longitude of the location to return the weather of

essential_properties.name: zipCode
essential_properties.description: The ID of city to return the weather of. List can be downloaded here: http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/.

common_operations.name: 5 Day Forecast
common_operations.description: Returns the weather data for the next 5 days
